name: Chronondrum (mario.png)
description:
You're a hero in an epic inter-tempo-spatial battle against your arch-nemesis. The thing is, messing with space-time fabric isn't the exact definition of "stable"... Can you figure out what's going on? 

The win condition and mechanics were intentionally left as a puzzle for the player to solve. (For extra difficulty, don't press the HELP button.)

This is our first time ever participating in a game jam. We couldn't do as much as we initially aimed for and it still needs a few more hours of polishing, but we definitely gathered a lot of experience. Anyways, hope you enjoy it!
